content: Hi, I'm trying to file a complaint against the company for their poor service. Can you help me with that?
I'd be happy to assist you. Can you provide more details about the issues you experienced?
Well, I've been trying to contact them for weeks and they keep putting me on hold. The customer service is really unhelpful.
I apologize for the inconvenience. Have you tried reaching out to their headquarters directly?
No, I don't think so. But I did receive a report from my friend who works there and they said it's been an issue with the company for months.
I see. It might be helpful to review the report your friend received to understand the scope of the problem.

The company has a policy of not being held responsible for any damages or losses caused by their poor service. I'm looking for someone to take action against them, but it seems like they're using this report as a way to avoid accountability.
